t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: The Silver Palate, Pasta Sauce, Low Sodium Marinara, 25 oz
s: Silver Palate has chosen to go with an evenly balanced blend of ingredients in their offering here. Surprisingly, one of the higher end ingredients used to make this sauce is San Marzano tomatoes. Such tomatoes are famous for containing less water and tend to thicken more quickly throughout the simmering process. Typically plum tomatoes are used exclusively instead by most other major brands...

t: Silver Palate | Our Story
s: In all our products and recipes we blend heart and soul, a bit of our own instincts and ingenuity, and only the best highest quality ingredients.It all started 35 years ago, when a wondrous jewel of a food store opened on Manhattan's Upper West Side. It was named The Silver Palate.
